mapper.select: SELECT A.CATEGORY_NO , A.REF_NO , A.LEV_NO , LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || A.CATEGORY_NM AS CATEGORY_NM , NVL(B.CATEGORY_CNT, 0) AS CATEGORY_CNT FROM T_EDU_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CATEGORY_CNT , CATEGORY_NO FROM T_EDU WHERE DEPT_NO = #{dept_no} GROUP BY CATEGORY_NO ) B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.DEPT_NO = #{dept_no} START WITH A.REF_NO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CATEGORY_NO = A.REF_NO
